instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Chivo' for all headings and 'Manrope' for body text. Import from Google Fonts.
Implement a 'Swiss Style' layout: high contrast, grid-based, lots of white space.
Use the primary red (#E31837) sparingly for CTAs and key accents only. Do not use it for large backgrounds.
Ensure all 'Cybersecurity' pages have a slightly darker, more technical feel (using Zinc-900 backgrounds for sections) compared to the 'IT Support' pages (mostly White/Zinc-50).
For the 'Industries Served' section, use the 'Lawyer' and 'Accountant' images provided to build trust with the specific target audience.
Create placeholder divs for Go High Level integrations with the specified IDs. Add a comment in the code: '<!-- GHL Integration Placeholder -->'.
Use Lucide React icons for all UI iconography. Use 'Shield', 'Lock', 'Server', 'Users', 'Activity' icons primarily.
Ensure the 'Contact' page includes a map placeholder for Langley, BC.
The 'About' page must emphasize 'Local Expertise' in Vancouver/Lower Mainland.
Use the provided logo URL in the Navbar and Footer: https://customer-assets.emergentagent.com/job_3b3d2e10-bde7-4823-bcb1-d3b5421626ce/artifacts/lfqh4i3f_ayvant.png
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
